message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000.  It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $8,500? That's still a good price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're sticking to your budget, but $7,800 just isn't quite enough for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $8,100?  That's a fair price for a high-quality product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,900 for the product. Can you consider this price?
